name: Fluent UI React
description: Fluent UI is Microsoft’s official UI library for building web applications that integrate seamlessly with Microsoft 365. It provides highly customizable components following Microsoft’s design language, ideal for enterprise-grade solutions.

name: PrimeVue
description: PrimeVue is a rich UI component library for Vue.js, offering over 90+ feature-rich, responsive, and customizable components. It includes widgets for forms, charts, tables, and overlays tailored for enterprise application development.

name: Chakra UI Vue
description: Chakra UI Vue is a modular and accessible component library for Vue.js based on Chakra UI’s design principles. It enables building responsive and themeable interfaces with composable props and out-of-the-box accessibility support.

name: Radix UI
description: Radix UI provides low-level, unstyled, accessible components for building high-quality design systems in React. Developers can build custom UIs with complete styling control while maintaining full accessibility and behavior guarantees.

name: Material Components for the Web
description: Material Components for the Web (MDC Web) is Google’s official library for implementing Material Design in web applications. It includes foundational components like buttons, cards, and dialogs with adaptive theming and a Sass framework.

name: Ink
description: Ink is a React-based library for building terminal applications. It brings component-based architecture and familiar React patterns to the command-line interface, making it ideal for creating stylish CLIs with real-time interactivity.

name: Base Web
description: Base Web is Uber’s design system implemented as a React component library. It provides a rich set of accessible, themeable components built for consistency and scalability across Uber’s web applications.

name: Taiga UI
description: Taiga UI is a fully customizable UI library for Angular applications. It offers over 100 components with native support for dark/light themes, internationalization, and accessibility — built with performance and scalability in mind.

name: Vanilla Framework
description: Vanilla Framework is a lightweight, extensible CSS framework developed by Canonical for building consistent UIs across web apps. It focuses on scalability, semantic HTML, and accessibility, and is used extensively across Ubuntu interfaces.

name: MUI X
description: MUI X is a set of advanced React UI components from the creators of Material UI. It includes data grid, date pickers, charts, and premium components designed for high-performance applications with enterprise use cases.

name: Quasar Framework
description: Quasar is a Vue.js-based UI framework that allows developers to build responsive websites, PWAs, mobile apps (via Cordova or Capacitor), and Electron apps from a single codebase. It comes with a wide range of prebuilt components and performance optimizations.

name: Shoelace
description: Shoelace is a forward-thinking library of web components built using native Web Components (no framework needed). It’s fully customizable via CSS and designed to work with any modern JavaScript framework or just plain HTML.

name: NextUI
description: NextUI is a React-based UI library built for speed and performance. It offers stylish and accessible components designed to work seamlessly with Next.js and other React frameworks, with SSR support and theming capabilities.

name: A11y Dialog
description: A11y Dialog is a lightweight and accessible modal dialog library built with vanilla JavaScript. It helps developers implement accessible modals that follow WAI-ARIA guidelines and work consistently across screen readers and browsers.

name: Oruga UI
description: Oruga is a lightweight, flexible UI library for Vue.js that focuses on simplicity and freedom of styling. It provides functional components without imposing design decisions, allowing developers to customize everything via external CSS.

name: Layr
description: Layr is a UI framework for full-stack JavaScript development. It allows UI components to directly access the backend logic and data using decorators and proxies, enabling more expressive UIs with minimal API boilerplate.

name: Elm UI
description: Elm UI is a layout and style framework for the Elm language, enabling developers to build modern UIs without writing HTML or CSS directly. It provides an expressive, functional abstraction for styling and layout rules.

name: Framer Motion
description: Framer Motion is a production-ready animation library for React. It allows UI developers to create smooth, interactive animations and transitions with ease, combining physics-based motion and declarative syntax.

name: KWC (Kodobe Web Components)
description: KWC is a UI component library based on Web Components designed by Kodobe. It includes a set of cross-framework components for form handling, layout, themes, and dialogs, working seamlessly in Vanilla JS, Vue, and React.

name: Fundamental Styles
description: Fundamental Styles is a SCSS-based UI design system developed by SAP. It provides CSS-only components with strict adherence to SAP Fiori design guidelines, enabling teams to create consistent and accessible enterprise interfaces.

name: Zendesk Garden
description: Zendesk Garden is the design system and React component library built by Zendesk. It focuses on accessibility, internationalization, and consistency across Zendesk’s products, with components like avatars, menus, tooltips, and modals.

name: Rebass
description: Rebass is a primitive component library for building consistent UI systems using styled-system and emotion. Designed for rapid prototyping in React, it allows flexible theming and composition with minimal CSS.

name: React Spectrum
description: React Spectrum is Adobe’s comprehensive React-based design system. It includes accessible, themeable components optimized for keyboard interaction and screen readers, intended for use in complex enterprise applications.

name: Grommet
description: Grommet is a responsive UI library for React developed by HPE. It offers themes, layout components, and accessibility support tailored for enterprise UX. Grommet supports custom themes and works well with design tokens.

name: OneMaterial
description: OneMaterial is a lightweight UI kit that implements Material Design using pure HTML and CSS without dependencies. It’s suitable for rapid prototyping or simple static sites that need a Material Design look without heavy tooling.

name: RSuite
description: RSuite is a React UI library specially designed for enterprise system products. It includes polished components for tables, trees, pickers, and modals — all with RTL support, accessibility, and i18n built-in.

name: Vuexy UI
description: Vuexy is a premium admin dashboard template built with Vue and React. It includes a wide array of custom components, charts, and layouts for building robust back-office dashboards and admin panels quickly.

name: Carbon Components Svelte
description: Carbon Components Svelte is the Svelte implementation of IBM’s Carbon Design System. It provides accessible, themeable components tailored for enterprise design, including support for light/dark themes and RTL layouts.

name: Shards React
description: Shards React is a modern UI toolkit based on Bootstrap 4, designed for React. It offers responsive components, lightweight design, and support for Material and Flat UI kits. Ideal for rapid development of clean interfaces.

name: React Toolbox
description: React Toolbox is a set of React components that implement Google’s Material Design specification using CSS Modules. It’s built on top of Webpack and PostCSS and is ideal for modular and themeable applications.

name: Vue Material
description: Vue Material is a lightweight framework that brings Google's Material Design to Vue.js applications. It provides UI components, themes, and transitions with minimal setup and full responsiveness across devices.

name: Skeleton
description: Skeleton is a simple, responsive, mobile-first CSS boilerplate that helps you kickstart UI development quickly. It provides a grid system, typography, buttons, and forms with minimal footprint and zero JavaScript.

name: React95
description: React95 is a React component library inspired by the Windows 95 aesthetic. It offers nostalgic retro UI components like buttons, modals, and toolbars styled after the iconic OS, making it perfect for fun or nostalgic apps.

name: UIKit
description: UIKit is a modern, lightweight, and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces. It includes a responsive grid system, basic components, JavaScript-powered interactions, and theming capabilities.

name: Balm UI
description: Balm UI is a modular UI component library for Vue.js that implements the Material Design specification. It is designed to be easy to use, extendable, and fully integrated with Vue’s reactive system.

name: Fomantic-UI
description: Fomantic-UI is a community fork of Semantic UI that continues active development. It includes modernized UI components, accessibility improvements, and enhanced responsive behaviors while retaining Semantic's declarative class system.

name: Metro 4
description: Metro 4 is a comprehensive front-end framework that provides Metro-style UI components, responsive layout grid, themes, and JavaScript utilities. Inspired by Microsoft Metro Design, it's ideal for dashboards and admin panels.

name: Spectre.css
description: Spectre.css is a lightweight, responsive, and modern CSS framework with a clean design. It includes basic styles for typography, tables, buttons, forms, and layout — perfect for minimalist UI development.

name: Blazorise
description: Blazorise is a UI component library built for Microsoft Blazor applications. It supports Bootstrap, Bulma, Material, and AntDesign themes, offering over 70 components for rapid web app development with C#.

name: Windmill UI
description: Windmill is a multi-theme, fully accessible Tailwind CSS admin dashboard template. It includes chart integrations, dark mode, and components optimized for speed and developer experience using Alpine.js and Tailwind.

name: Angular Material
description: Angular Material is the official Material Design component library for Angular applications. It includes a full suite of UI components such as buttons, dialogs, inputs, and toolbars with responsive and accessible behaviors built-in.

name: ThemeKit
description: ThemeKit is a modern front-end UI kit built on top of Bootstrap 5. It offers pre-designed themes, components, layout systems, and color schemes that help teams accelerate development and achieve consistent branding.

name: Shoelace CSS
description: Shoelace CSS is a small utility-first CSS library focused on normalization, responsive grid layouts, and minimal styling. It’s framework-agnostic and works well for rapid development and prototyping in static websites.

name: Bliss
description: Bliss is a lightweight utility JavaScript UI helper library that simplifies DOM manipulation and UI interactivity. It’s ideal for developers building UIs with minimal dependencies and high browser compatibility.

name: Materialize
description: Materialize is a modern responsive front-end framework based on Google's Material Design. It provides a grid system, UI components, and animations built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for fast web prototyping.

name: Ariakit
description: Ariakit (formerly Reakit) is a library of low-level accessible UI components for React. It provides headless, unstyled primitives that offer complete control over UI logic while maintaining WAI-ARIA accessibility standards.

name: Framework7
description: Framework7 is a full-featured HTML framework for building mobile apps with native look and feel. It supports iOS and Android themes, and can be used with vanilla JS, Vue, or React to build cross-platform UIs.

name: Mosaic UI
description: Mosaic is a Tailwind CSS-powered UI kit developed by Cruip. It features well-structured layouts and components tailored for admin dashboards, SaaS platforms, and data-rich interfaces with dark mode support.

name: React Aria Components
description: React Aria Components is a headless UI library built by Adobe, offering accessible and themeable components like sliders, menus, and dialogs. It decouples logic from presentation, letting developers bring their own design systems.

name: SvelteUI
description: SvelteUI is a component library for Svelte applications with fully typed, themeable, and accessible components. It includes responsive layouts, dark mode support, and utility-first styling based on Tailwind principles.

name: Milkdown
description: Milkdown is a headless and fully customizable markdown editor built with ProseMirror. It supports real-time collaboration, theming, and plugin-based architecture, making it perfect for embedding into custom UI applications.

name: GrapesJS
description: GrapesJS is a free and open-source web builder framework used for creating responsive templates without coding. It includes drag-and-drop blocks, rich text editing, and style management tools, ideal for email builders and CMS plugins.

name: Mantine
description: Mantine is a full-featured React component library with 100+ customizable components, dark mode, and built-in hooks. It’s optimized for TypeScript and SSR, making it ideal for modern web apps and dashboards.

name: Shoelace Next
description: Shoelace Next is the next-gen version of Shoelace Web Components with smaller bundle size and improved tree-shaking. It offers all essential UI components in a framework-agnostic package ready for production use.

name: Frappe UI
description: Frappe UI is the component library used in Frappe and ERPNext. Built using Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS, it includes clean, accessible, and performant UI components suitable for enterprise applications and admin interfaces.

name: Webrix
description: Webrix is a minimalist UI component library for React focused on layout, drag-and-drop, and resizable panels. It’s designed for building dashboards, split views, and rich layout interfaces with maximum control.

name: PhotonKit
description: PhotonKit is a UI toolkit for building desktop-like interfaces in web apps. Inspired by GitHub’s Electron UI, it’s ideal for apps targeting desktop environments or needing native look and feel using HTML/CSS.

name: Plasmic
description: Plasmic is a visual UI builder for React and code-first teams. It enables low-code development of high-performance components, allowing both designers and developers to contribute to the UI with clean code integration.

name: Marble UI
description: Marble UI is a lightweight and themeable UI framework for Angular-based enterprise apps. It supports modular design, component overrides, and integration with Liferay’s platform for building enterprise-grade interfaces.

name: Open Props
description: Open Props is a CSS variables library providing design tokens for spacing, colors, typography, and effects. It works with any framework or raw CSS and encourages consistent UI styling across design systems.

name: Refine
description: Refine is a React-based headless framework for building enterprise-level CRUD apps quickly. It includes data providers, authentication, routing, and customizable UI integrations with libraries like Ant Design, Material UI, and Chakra UI.

name: Argon Dashboard
description: Argon Dashboard is a modern admin dashboard template built on Bootstrap 5. It features prebuilt UI elements, form controls, charts, and a clean interface ideal for backend dashboards and project management tools.

name: Shoelace Lite
description: Shoelace Lite is a lightweight subset of the Shoelace web component library optimized for small apps and landing pages. It provides essential UI elements with minimal overhead, fast load times, and excellent accessibility.

name: Tail-Kit
description: Tail-Kit is a UI library featuring over 250 fully coded components built with Tailwind CSS. It includes dashboards, widgets, buttons, and more — all styled with modern utility classes and available in dark/light themes.

name: Element Plus
description: Element Plus is the Vue 3 version of the popular Element UI library. It offers a full suite of components for enterprise and admin interfaces with comprehensive documentation, i18n, and accessibility support.

name: Glide.js
description: Glide.js is a dependency-free JavaScript slider and carousel library focused on performance and flexibility. It supports responsive layouts, swipe gestures, and custom breakpoints with a tiny bundle size.

name: Cork Admin Template
description: Cork Admin is a responsive admin dashboard template built using Bootstrap 5 and jQuery. It includes advanced components such as calendars, tables, modals, and notification systems, useful for complex web apps.

name: Vue Final Modal
description: Vue Final Modal is a highly customizable modal component for Vue 3 that supports multiple instances, drag-and-drop, teleportation, and animations. It’s ideal for building dynamic and interactive modals with full accessibility.

name: Svelte Headless UI
description: Svelte Headless UI is a port of Tailwind Labs' Headless UI for Svelte. It offers unstyled, accessible components such as dialogs, tabs, and menus that allow developers to build their own design systems from logic-only components.

name: Felte
description: Felte is a form library for Svelte, Solid, and React that simplifies form handling with minimal boilerplate. It includes validation, data transformation, and submission tracking with first-class TypeScript support.

name: Svelte Materialify
description: Svelte Materialify is a UI component library for Svelte based on Material Design. It includes over 50 customizable components, responsive layout grids, and built-in dark mode, making it suitable for modern Svelte apps.

name: Sirius UI
description: Sirius UI is a lightweight, responsive CSS framework designed for SaaS dashboards and internal tools. It provides a grid system, utility classes, and essential components built for clean, minimal UIs.

name: Solid UI
description: Solid UI is a collection of accessible, composable UI components for SolidJS. Built with best practices in accessibility and performance, it’s ideal for developers adopting SolidJS for modern frontend applications.

name: React Bulma Components
description: React Bulma Components is a set of React components built using the Bulma CSS framework. It provides reusable, semantic, and customizable UI components for fast development of clean web interfaces.

name: DaisyUI Pro
description: DaisyUI Pro is the premium version of the popular Tailwind CSS plugin DaisyUI. It offers exclusive components, layouts, and themes tailored for production-grade apps and enterprise design systems.

name: FastUI
description: FastUI is a UI component library designed for speed, modularity, and minimalism. It includes tree-shakable components, optimized bundles, and TypeScript support for building performance-focused web interfaces.

name: Lit Elements
description: Lit Elements is a library for building fast, lightweight Web Components using the Lit library. It simplifies creation of reusable UI components with fine-grained control over rendering and styles.

name: Cirrus
description: Cirrus is a CSS framework designed for rapid prototyping and clean visual design. It includes utility-first classes, grid systems, and components like cards, modals, and alerts — ideal for building beautiful static pages.

name: Windmill React UI
description: Windmill React UI is a Tailwind CSS-based component library optimized for React apps. It supports dark mode, accessibility, and includes prebuilt elements for admin dashboards and internal tools.

name: Bolt Design System
description: Bolt is a flexible and powerful front-end UI framework created by the Pegasystems design team. It offers design tokens, responsive layout tools, and ready-to-use components supporting Twig, Web Components, and more.

name: Vue Interface
description: Vue Interface is a modern UI framework built for Vue 3. It includes pre-styled components, layout grids, modal systems, and responsive elements. Designed with scalability and maintainability in mind.

name: Tailblocks
description: Tailblocks is a collection of ready-to-use Tailwind CSS blocks and components for quickly building landing pages. Each block is fully responsive and customizable, designed for developers seeking rapid prototyping.

name: UIV
description: UIV is a Bootstrap 3 component library for Vue.js. It provides components like modals, dropdowns, tooltips, and carousels that follow Bootstrap’s look and feel but are natively implemented in Vue.

name: Nord UI
description: Nord UI is a minimal design system built on the Nord color palette. It includes SASS utilities, pre-designed buttons, inputs, cards, and form layouts tailored for calm, distraction-free interfaces.

name: MUI Base
description: MUI Base is a headless component library from the MUI team that provides unstyled components with logic and accessibility built-in. Perfect for teams building a custom design system atop Material UI's foundation.

name: ASAP UI
description: ASAP UI is a minimal CSS component library with no JavaScript. Built for high-performance interfaces, it includes atomic layout utilities, form elements, and design tokens, perfect for projects prioritizing speed and simplicity.

name: Bulmil
description: Bulmil is a set of Web Components styled with Bulma. It brings form inputs, navbars, tabs, and modals as encapsulated custom elements compatible with any JavaScript framework or plain HTML.

name: iView
description: iView is a high-quality UI component library based on Vue.js. It offers a complete set of components including tables, modals, trees, and charts — ideal for complex admin panels and dashboards.

name: NES.css
description: NES.css is a fun and retro 8-bit style CSS framework inspired by classic Nintendo games. It includes pixel-styled buttons, containers, inputs, and animations — perfect for game-themed or nostalgic UI projects.

name: PrimeNG
description: PrimeNG is a comprehensive UI component library for Angular. It offers over 80 components including calendars, charts, data tables, and drag-and-drop support, making it ideal for robust enterprise-grade Angular apps.

name: Sveltestrap
description: Sveltestrap brings Bootstrap 4 components into the Svelte ecosystem. It provides native Svelte components such as buttons, modals, cards, and carousels with Bootstrap styling and responsive design out of the box.

name: Carbon Components Angular
description: Carbon Components Angular is IBM’s Angular implementation of the Carbon Design System. It includes accessible and flexible UI components for enterprise applications, aligned with IBM's branding and design philosophy.

name: Chota
description: Chota is a micro CSS framework weighing less than 3KB. It provides minimal styles for layout, typography, forms, and buttons — suitable for extremely lightweight UI development with zero JavaScript dependencies.

name: Tailwind Elements
description: Tailwind Elements is a UI kit for Tailwind CSS that includes interactive components like modals, dropdowns, and carousels with JavaScript support. It helps developers build rich UIs quickly with Tailwind’s utility-first approach.

name: Clay
description: Clay is a web component-based design system created by Liferay. It includes UI components, layout tools, accessibility features, and utilities used in Liferay DXP for building consistent and extensible user interfaces.

name: VueTailwind
description: VueTailwind is a customizable component library for Vue.js built with Tailwind CSS. It allows developers to configure components globally using Tailwind classes and offers support for dynamic theming and variants.

name: Solid Headless
description: Solid Headless is a collection of headless UI primitives for SolidJS, inspired by Headless UI. It includes components for tabs, modals, lists, and transitions, focusing on logic and accessibility while leaving styling to the developer.

name: Propeller
description: Propeller is a responsive front-end framework that combines Bootstrap and Material Design. It includes ready-to-use components and features from both worlds, offering a hybrid UI kit for fast prototyping and UI development.

name: shiny.semantic
description: shiny.semantic brings the Semantic UI styling to R Shiny apps. It provides UI components and layout tools that help R developers build beautiful, accessible dashboards using Shiny’s reactive programming model.

name: Tremor
description: Tremor is a React-based UI library focused on data dashboards and analytics interfaces. It provides ready-made cards, charts, and metric components, styled with Tailwind CSS, optimized for business apps and reports.

name: Vue Notus
description: Vue Notus is a free and open-source UI kit built with Tailwind CSS and Vue.js. It provides pre-styled components, page layouts, and custom utilities, ideal for developing dashboards, websites, or landing pages.

name: React Bento
description: React Bento is a modern layout library for building bento-grid UI interfaces in React. It enables developers to construct animated tiles, stacked content, and interactive UI sections with performance-optimized rendering.

name: Svelte Materialify Next
description: Svelte Materialify Next is the continuation of the original Svelte Materialify project with better support for SvelteKit and TypeScript. It includes material-inspired components with dark mode and responsive grids.

name: Vanilla Extract
description: Vanilla Extract is a zero-runtime TypeScript-first CSS-in-JS framework. It enables building scalable styles with full type safety, theming support, and style composition without injecting CSS at runtime.

name: Vuikit
description: Vuikit is a modular UI library for Vue.js based on the UIkit framework. It provides consistent components for layout, forms, modals, and navigation, designed for Vue applications that favor UIkit’s styling approach.

name: Revo UI
description: Revo UI is a TypeScript-based component library built on Tailwind and React. It emphasizes performance, DX, and design consistency, and includes composable components like dropdowns, tables, and navigation menus.

name: MUI Joy UI
description: Joy UI is a second design system from the MUI team. It offers elegant components with enhanced customization and style props, intended for teams building consumer-facing apps with expressive design needs.

name: Eufemia
description: Eufemia is the design system from DNB Bank, built using React and SCSS. It includes highly accessible components, design tokens, and patterns aligned with Nordic design aesthetics and WCAG standards.

name: Pico.css
description: Pico.css is a minimal CSS framework for semantic HTML. It requires no classes to style elements and offers built-in dark mode, responsiveness, and clean defaults — ideal for prototyping and documentation sites.

name: SvelteKit Admin
description: SvelteKit Admin is a modern UI starter template for building admin dashboards in SvelteKit. It integrates Tailwind CSS, form validation, dark mode, and responsive layout for production-ready internal tools.

name: Vuesax
description: Vuesax is a Vue.js UI library with a fresh and modern design. It offers unique visual components and styles, support for dark mode, and customization through variables — making it ideal for creative Vue projects.

name: SkynexUI
description: SkynexUI is a design system and React component library for building cross-platform UIs using the same syntax across web and native platforms. It supports theming and style tokens, built on top of React Native Web.

name: Essential UI
description: Essential UI is a collection of enterprise-grade components built with Web Components. It includes interactive charts, grids, and data visualizations ideal for business apps and dashboards across frameworks.

name: Solid Bootstrap
description: Solid Bootstrap brings Bootstrap-styled components to the SolidJS framework. It allows developers to use familiar Bootstrap interfaces while benefiting from Solid’s reactivity and performance model.

name: Amaze UI
description: Amaze UI is a mobile-first front-end framework based on HTML5 and CSS3. Originally developed for the Chinese market, it supports responsive design and includes a large set of UI components tailored for mobile apps.

name: Ripe UI
description: Ripe UI is a lightweight UI library developed by Platforme for React apps. It focuses on modularity and clarity, offering small yet functional components for building modern product configurators and dashboards.

name: Bloom
description: Bloom is a modern, themeable component library built for SolidJS with support for Tailwind and full accessibility. It includes UI primitives and complex widgets, optimized for app performance and flexibility.

name: React Admin Kit
description: React Admin Kit is a sleek and responsive admin dashboard template for React developers. It includes form layouts, charts, tables, authentication templates, and ready-to-use themes for quick admin setup.

name: WebLibrary
description: WebLibrary is a zero-dependency UI utility library with a focus on accessibility, keyboard navigation, and performance. It includes building blocks for dropdowns, modals, and tooltips in raw JS or TypeScript.

name: Atomize
description: Atomize is a React UI framework that allows developers to design scalable and consistent design systems. It includes atoms, molecules, and utility-first layout tools, inspired by the atomic design methodology.

name: Polaris React
description: Polaris is Shopify’s React-based design system that provides accessible, elegant components and design tokens tailored for building commerce interfaces. It’s used across Shopify apps and extensions.

name: Baseguide
description: Baseguide is a simple UI kit built with SCSS and modular design principles. It provides responsive layout helpers, typography, buttons, and basic components ideal for lightweight web applications.

name: Aura Design
description: Aura is a Figma-aligned design system and component library for React. It supports theming, dark mode, and accessibility, and aims to provide pixel-perfect parity between code and design.

name: Element React
description: Element React is the React port of the popular Element UI framework. It brings well-designed and accessible UI components to React apps, including tables, popovers, inputs, and more.

name: Fancy Components
description: Fancy Components is a Tailwind-based UI kit with pre-styled form controls, dropdowns, badges, alerts, and grid elements. It targets modern web apps that favor clean, utility-driven UI patterns.

name: Vue Multiselect
description: Vue Multiselect is a flexible multi-select input component for Vue 2 and 3. It supports tagging, search, single/multiple selections, and custom templates — perfect for forms and filters.

name: Material UI Pickers
description: Material UI Pickers is a date and time picker library built on top of MUI components. It includes highly customizable date, time, and range selectors with localization and keyboard support.

name: UI Ninja
description: UI Ninja is a CSS utility toolkit designed for design-to-code efficiency. It offers variables, atomic classes, layout tools, and accessibility helpers that align closely with design tokens and Figma exports.

name: Bulkit
description: Bulkit is a modern web UI kit based on Bulma CSS. It includes stylish landing page layouts, navbar designs, hero sections, and pricing cards — ready for fast web development and marketing sites.

name: Reflexbox
description: Reflexbox is a responsive layout and positioning system for React powered by styled-system. It helps developers build flexible layouts with simple props, including grids, boxes, and spacing controls.

name: Govi UI
description: Govi UI is a Vue 3 component library focused on simplicity and accessibility. It provides modal, dropdown, tooltip, and accordion components with headless logic that developers can fully customize with their own styles.

name: Himalaya
description: Himalaya is a utility for parsing and serializing HTML into JSON and back, useful for UI diffing tools and custom rendering. While not a UI framework itself, it's often used to build customizable UIs from rich content.

name: Nordic UI
description: Nordic UI is a minimalist CSS framework based on the Nord color palette. It provides basic typography, form elements, and grid systems that suit documentation sites, blogs, and calm user interfaces.

name: Svelma
description: Svelma is a UI component library for Svelte based on the Bulma CSS framework. It includes form controls, buttons, modals, and layout elements styled with Bulma and wrapped in Svelte components.

name: Shoelace React
description: Shoelace React is a lightweight wrapper for using Shoelace Web Components natively within React applications. It enables full integration with JSX and component props while leveraging the flexibility of Web Components.

name: Huebee
description: Huebee is a one-click color picker UI component that provides a simple palette interface. It’s lightweight, framework-agnostic, and designed to work inside forms, popovers, or modal dialogs with ease.

name: Gridlex
description: Gridlex is a CSS flexbox-based grid system with responsive classes and spacing utilities. It’s useful for developers who want a simple, declarative way to structure UIs without diving into custom CSS.

name: Rivet Core
description: Rivet is a design system and front-end framework created by Indiana University. It focuses on accessibility, branding compliance, and responsive UI components tailored for institutional websites and portals.

name: React Floater
description: React Floater is a tooltip and guided tour UI component for React apps. It supports positioning, interactive popups, and step-by-step tutorials to onboard users with flexible configuration options.

name: Marpit
description: Marpit is a Markdown presentation framework for building slide decks with styleable components. It converts Markdown into web-based presentations, supporting themes, code highlighting, and custom CSS.

name: React Burger Menu
description: React Burger Menu is a customizable sidebar navigation component with animated menu transitions. It supports various effects such as slide, stack, and elastic, and works well for mobile-friendly interfaces.

name: Cirrus UI
description: Cirrus UI is a modular and responsive CSS framework offering utility classes, UI elements, and animation support. It is designed to help developers build aesthetically pleasing websites rapidly.

name: UI Lib
description: UI Lib is a collection of reusable React components for dashboards and enterprise applications. It includes themes, form elements, chart integration, and table layouts tailored for business tools.

name: Dazzling CSS
description: Dazzling CSS is a micro CSS framework optimized for bold, colorful UIs. It includes bright color palettes, animated UI components, and button styles that fit creative websites and portfolios.

name: React DnD Kit
description: React DnD Kit is a modern, accessible drag-and-drop toolkit for React. It provides sensors, sortable lists, keyboard controls, and extensible APIs for building powerful interactive UIs.

name: LayoutIt Grid
description: LayoutIt Grid is a visual grid generator tool that produces clean CSS grid layouts for UI designs. It is widely used to scaffold complex web page structures before applying custom styling.

name: NextUI Kit
description: NextUI Kit is a lightweight component library tailored for Next.js. It includes navigation bars, form inputs, page layouts, and themes optimized for static and SSR React applications.

name: Shorthand CSS
description: Shorthand CSS is a minimal CSS framework focused on clean naming conventions and rapid layout building. It uses logical CSS class names and avoids utility overload, ideal for lean design systems.

name: Frappe Gantt
description: Frappe Gantt is a simple, modern Gantt chart component written in JavaScript. It’s designed to work well within dashboards or admin panels and supports drag-and-drop, zooming, and multiple task views.

name: Vue Advanced Cropper
description: Vue Advanced Cropper is a versatile image cropping component for Vue.js with zoom, rotation, and aspect ratio support. It’s well-suited for user avatars, image uploaders, and content editors.

name: Proton UI
description: Proton UI is a lightweight design system with minimal dependencies for Vue and vanilla JavaScript projects. It provides fully responsive components like cards, alerts, inputs, and switches designed for fast rendering.

name: Blueprint CSS
description: Blueprint CSS is a minimalist CSS layout library that includes a flexible grid system, baseline typography, and reset styles. It is well-suited for designers who want consistent page structures without heavy UI kits.

name: React Select
description: React Select is a flexible and customizable select dropdown library for React. It supports single and multi-select, async options loading, searchable menus, and custom rendering with accessibility in mind.

name: Pixel Lite
description: Pixel Lite is a clean and minimal Bootstrap 5 UI kit featuring pre-styled components for landing pages, portfolios, and blogs. It offers dark mode support and layout templates for modern responsive design.

name: Plump UI
description: Plump UI is a component-rich framework built for dashboards and enterprise tools. It features real-time graphs, toggle controls, sidebars, and alert systems. Designed with data-driven apps in mind.

name: Tailwind Dashboard Kit
description: Tailwind Dashboard Kit is a ready-made dashboard UI library with over 100 Tailwind CSS-based components. It includes tables, analytics cards, forms, charts, and navigation elements optimized for admin apps.

name: React Table
description: React Table is a lightweight, fully customizable table component for React. It supports sorting, filtering, pagination, and virtualized rendering — ideal for large data sets in dashboards or admin panels.

name: React Datepicker
description: React Datepicker is a simple and reusable date picker component for React. It supports localization, time selection, and keyboard accessibility, making it a popular choice for form date inputs.

name: Svelte Cubed
description: Svelte Cubed is a UI framework for building 3D experiences in the browser using Svelte and Three.js. It allows declarative creation of 3D scenes, perfect for games, data visualization, or immersive UIs.

name: Evergreen
description: Evergreen is a React UI framework by Segment, offering polished components and a consistent design system. It’s ideal for building modern SaaS applications with built-in theming, accessibility, and layout tools.

name: CSS Doodle
description: CSS Doodle is a web component for drawing patterns using CSS. It enables generative art, creative UI backgrounds, and animations via CSS Grid and custom properties, suitable for experimental or artistic web design.

name: React Spinners
description: React Spinners is a collection of loading spinner components for React. It provides CSS-based animated loaders with support for custom colors, sizes, and accessibility via ARIA roles.

name: React Toastify
description: React Toastify is a highly customizable toast notification library for React. It offers built-in animations, auto-dismiss logic, and accessibility support for quick alerting in web applications.

name: NProgress
description: NProgress is a slim progress bar UI library for web apps, especially during page loads or AJAX requests. It supports easy integration with frontend routers and frameworks like React, Vue, or plain JavaScript.

name: React Beautiful DnD
description: React Beautiful DnD is a drag-and-drop library by Atlassian for creating beautiful and accessible lists. It supports reordering, dragging across containers, and screen reader compatibility.

name: React Hot Toast
description: React Hot Toast is a lightweight and fast toast notification library for React. It provides a simple API, minimal styling, and beautiful default animations for alerting users within modern UIs.

name: Tabler UI
description: Tabler UI is a responsive and customizable admin dashboard template built with Bootstrap. It includes advanced UI components, charts, tables, and widgets for building control panels and backend systems.

name: GLightbox
description: GLightbox is a pure JavaScript lightbox library for images, iframes, and videos. It supports responsive design, swipe gestures, and animations — ideal for photo galleries and portfolios.

name: React Tooltip
description: React Tooltip is a versatile tooltip library for React with support for custom styles, HTML content, delays, and click triggers. It enhances user guidance and interactivity in complex UIs.

name: React Spring
description: React Spring is a spring-physics-based animation library for React. It helps create fluid, interactive animations and transitions with hooks and declarative configuration for both simple and complex motions.

name: Tiny Slider
description: Tiny Slider is a lightweight, responsive, and dependency-free carousel library. It supports touch, keyboard, and mouse interactions with customizable settings and autoplay features.

name: Vue Tabs Component
description: Vue Tabs Component is a lightweight, flexible tabbed interface for Vue.js. It supports dynamic tab content, transitions, and slot-based templates, great for building sectioned UIs in single-page apps.

name: Tailwind Styled Components
description: Tailwind Styled Components allows the use of Tailwind CSS with styled-components syntax. It brings utility-first styling into the CSS-in-JS ecosystem, ideal for theming and conditional class application.

name: React Focus Lock
description: React Focus Lock is a library to manage focus traps for modals, popovers, and dialogs in React apps. It ensures keyboard users stay within active components, supporting accessibility best practices.

name: Vue Formulate
description: Vue Formulate simplifies form creation in Vue.js. It supports validation, custom inputs, slots, and themes with minimal boilerplate — designed to improve UX and form maintainability.

name: React Live
description: React Live is a component that renders editable React code with real-time preview. It’s useful for documentation, playgrounds, and demos — built with Babel and React DOM under the hood.

name: Vue Slider Component
description: Vue Slider Component is a highly customizable slider component for Vue.js. It supports range selection, tooltips, vertical orientation, and extensive configuration for modern UIs.

name: React Modal
description: React Modal is an accessible modal dialog component for React. It includes focus management, keyboard navigation, ARIA roles, and customizable styling, great for authentication and overlays.

name: Vue Draggable
description: Vue Draggable is a Vue.js wrapper for Sortable.js, offering reordering and drag-and-drop functionality. It supports touch devices, transition animations, and nested lists.

name: Focus Visible
description: Focus Visible is a polyfill and utility that applies focus styles only when the user interacts via keyboard. It helps enforce accessibility guidelines and reduces unwanted outlines on mouse interactions.

name: Keen Slider
description: Keen Slider is a fast, lightweight, and customizable touch slider with native-like swipe behavior. It supports vertical mode, responsive layouts, breakpoints, and carousel features for modern web apps.

name: Tailwind Variants
description: Tailwind Variants is a utility to simplify reusable component styling in Tailwind CSS. It helps manage variants, compound classes, and complex conditional styling in large design systems or projects.

name: React Measure
description: React Measure is a React hook and component that helps measure the dimensions of elements in real time. It's perfect for responsive UI calculations, conditional layouts, and animations.

name: Splide
description: Splide is a flexible and extensible JavaScript slider library supporting vertical slides, multiple items, thumbnails, and autoplay. It has no dependencies and is framework-agnostic.

name: Vue Notification
description: Vue Notification is a Vue.js library for lightweight, animated toast notifications. It allows for different message types, durations, transitions, and custom styles, ideal for alerts and status messages.

name: Tweakpane
description: Tweakpane is a compact pane UI for live-editing parameters in JavaScript apps. It’s used in demos, creative coding tools, and visualizers for adjusting colors, sliders, checkboxes, and more.

name: React Responsive Carousel
description: React Responsive Carousel is a flexible and fully responsive carousel component for React. It includes swipe support, keyboard navigation, autoplay, and customizable transitions for galleries and sliders.

name: Tailwind Scrollbar
description: Tailwind Scrollbar is a plugin for Tailwind CSS that enables easy customization of scrollbars with utility classes. It supports light/dark themes and is compatible across major browsers.

name: React Confetti
description: React Confetti is a fun visual component that renders animated confetti for celebration UIs. It’s great for user feedback, gamified applications, or reward-based flows in React apps.

name: Vue.js Toggle Button
description: Vue.js Toggle Button is a customizable switch component with labels, sizes, colors, and transition effects. It’s ideal for settings toggles, dark/light modes, or simple UI interactions.

name: Svelte Carousel
description: Svelte Carousel is a responsive carousel component for Svelte with touch support, autoplay, and customizable indicators. It’s designed for image sliders, testimonials, and interactive showcases.

name: React Swipeable
description: React Swipeable is a lightweight gesture component for React that enables swipe detection on any element. It's ideal for mobile UIs, drawers, carousels, and gesture-driven apps.

name: React Credit Cards
description: React Credit Cards is a customizable credit card form and visualization component. It renders a live preview of the card based on user input — great for checkout and payment UIs.

name: Vue Chart.js
description: Vue Chart.js is a wrapper around Chart.js for Vue applications. It allows reactive, responsive chart components including line, bar, pie, radar, and more — ideal for data-driven dashboards.

name: React Grid Layout
description: React Grid Layout is a draggable and resizable grid system for React. It enables dashboard-style UI layouts with support for breakpoints, drag handles, and responsive behaviors.

name: Vue Datepicker
description: Vue Datepicker is a flexible date selection component for Vue.js. It includes inline, popup, and range modes with i18n support, keyboard accessibility, and theming options.

name: Vue Context Menu
description: Vue Context Menu is a right-click context menu component for Vue apps. It supports custom item rendering, nested submenus, click handlers, and keyboard shortcuts.

name: React Content Loader
description: React Content Loader allows you to create SVG placeholder loading animations for React apps. It mimics content structure using animated skeleton screens for better perceived performance.

name: Vue Slider
description: Vue Slider is a customizable and touch-friendly range slider component for Vue.js. It supports tooltips, labels, min/max handles, and responsive layouts — great for filters and forms.

name: Vue Loading Overlay
description: Vue Loading Overlay provides a spinner-based full-screen loading indicator for Vue apps. It supports dynamic messaging, custom animations, and background overlays with fade effects.

name: Vue Good Table
description: Vue Good Table is an easy-to-use data table component for Vue.js. It includes pagination, sorting, filtering, and server-side support, making it ideal for building responsive data grids.

name: SwiperJS
description: SwiperJS is one of the most modern and flexible slider libraries for touch interfaces. It supports React, Vue, Svelte, and vanilla JS, with features like virtual slides, autoplay, navigation, and parallax.

name: Vue Notification Bell
description: Vue Notification Bell is a UI widget for Vue apps that mimics the notification dropdowns of modern SaaS platforms. It includes badge counters, animation, and templating support for messages.

name: Vue Toggle
description: Vue Toggle is a simple switch button component with support for animation, theming, and accessibility. It's commonly used for dark/light mode toggles, preferences, or binary UI settings.

name: React CountUp
description: React CountUp is a React component that animates numbers counting up. It's useful for stat widgets, dashboards, and financial interfaces, with custom formatting and easing options.

name: Vue Upload Component
description: Vue Upload Component is a versatile file upload input for Vue.js. It includes drag-and-drop, progress tracking, validation, and preview generation — ideal for forms and dashboards.

name: React Joyride
description: React Joyride is a user onboarding and guided tour library for React. It provides step-by-step overlays, modals, and tooltips to introduce app features interactively.

name: Vue3 Burger Menu
description: Vue3 Burger Menu is a mobile-first sidebar menu component inspired by React Burger Menu. It supports slide, push, and reveal effects with transitions and accessibility features.

name: React Reveal
description: React Reveal is a high-performance animation library for React. It provides reveal-on-scroll effects like fade, zoom, slide, and bounce to enhance user experience in UIs.

name: Vue Good Wizard
description: Vue Good Wizard is a simple and flexible step-based wizard component for Vue.js. It’s perfect for multi-step forms, checkout flows, and guided processes in single-page apps.

name: React StepZilla
description: React StepZilla is a multi-step form and wizard component for React applications. It includes step navigation, validation hooks, and dynamic field logic for complex workflows.

name: Vue Number Animation
description: Vue Number Animation is a Vue.js component that animates numbers from a start to end value. It's frequently used in counters, stats cards, and dashboards for smooth transitions.

name: React CSS Spinners
description: React CSS Spinners is a collection of minimal, pure-CSS animated spinners for React. It includes multiple loader variants, zero dependencies, and easy integration into form submissions or loading states.

name: Vue Drag Resize
description: Vue Drag Resize is a Vue component that makes any element draggable and resizable. It’s perfect for interactive dashboards, editors, and canvas-style UIs.

name: React Images
description: React Images is a lightbox gallery component for React with zoom, navigation, thumbnails, and swipe gestures. It’s ideal for media-heavy websites and portfolios.

name: Vue JSON Pretty
description: Vue JSON Pretty is a Vue component to render JSON data in a formatted, collapsible tree. It supports syntax highlighting and clipboard integration, often used in developer dashboards.

name: React Image Lightbox
description: React Image Lightbox is a flexible and responsive lightbox component for displaying images in React apps. It supports keyboard navigation, zoom, rotation, and fullscreen modes.

name: Vue Star Rating
description: Vue Star Rating is a star-based rating input component for Vue. It supports half-star ratings, touch interaction, hover feedback, and accessibility for reviews or product feedback.

name: React Copy to Clipboard
description: React Copy to Clipboard is a simple component for copying text to the clipboard. It supports tooltips, events, and accessibility, often used for sharing links or values in dashboards.

name: Vue Tour
description: Vue Tour is a lightweight and customizable tour plugin for Vue.js. It provides guided step-by-step overlays and descriptions to introduce features and improve onboarding experiences.

name: React Syntax Highlighter
description: React Syntax Highlighter is a customizable syntax highlighting component using Highlight.js or Prism. It supports server-side rendering, themes, line numbering, and code styling.

name: Vue Slide Bar
description: Vue Slide Bar is a Vue.js range slider with support for tooltips, min/max constraints, and custom styles. It’s ideal for volume, price filters, or preference input sliders.

name: React Tabs
description: React Tabs is a declarative and accessible tabs component for React. It supports keyboard navigation, ARIA roles, and customizable styling to create tabbed interfaces quickly.

name: Vue Markdown
description: Vue Markdown is a markdown-to-HTML renderer component that allows Vue developers to embed live Markdown content in components or views. It supports syntax highlighting and scoped styling.

name: React Outside Click Handler
description: React Outside Click Handler is a component that detects when a click occurs outside its boundaries. It’s widely used to close dropdowns, modals, or tooltips based on user behavior.

name: Vuejs Paginate
description: Vuejs Paginate is a pagination component for Vue that supports both client and server-side paging. It includes page ranges, navigation icons, and slot customization for full UI control.

name: React Calendar
description: React Calendar is a flexible and lightweight date picker and calendar component for React. It supports range selection, multiple views, and date formatting utilities.

name: Vue Tags Input
description: Vue Tags Input is a simple input UI for entering and managing tags. It supports auto-complete, validation, character limits, and keyboard navigation for modern tagging systems.

name: React Popper Tooltip
description: React Popper Tooltip is a tooltip wrapper based on Popper.js with smart positioning, portals, transitions, and custom triggers. It's great for hover hints, menus, and inline interactions.

name: Vue Grid Layout
description: Vue Grid Layout is a draggable and resizable grid layout system for Vue.js. It is inspired by React Grid Layout and supports drag-and-drop, resizable widgets, and responsive breakpoints.

name: React Tag Input
description: React Tag Input is a React component for entering and managing tags with support for deletions, validation, autocomplete, and copy/paste. It is ideal for input fields like categories or keywords.

name: Vue Tippy
description: Vue Tippy is a Vue wrapper for the Tippy.js tooltip library. It supports themes, animations, interactive tooltips, and placement logic, making it suitable for rich, accessible hints in UIs.

name: React Draggable
description: React Draggable is a React component for creating draggable UI elements. It supports bounds, snapping, event callbacks, and scaling for use in dashboards or interactive layouts.

name: Vue Color
description: Vue Color is a set of Vue.js components that implement popular color pickers like Sketch, Photoshop, and Chrome. It’s used in design tools and apps requiring theme editing features.

name: React Avatar Editor
description: React Avatar Editor is a React component for image cropping and scaling, commonly used in profile image uploads. It supports zoom, drag, and border radius control.

name: Vue2 Dropzone
description: Vue2 Dropzone is a Vue wrapper for Dropzone.js that supports drag-and-drop file uploads, image previews, progress bars, and custom styling. Ideal for form-based file input.

name: React Image Gallery
description: React Image Gallery is a responsive, customizable gallery component for React. It supports lazy loading, fullscreen mode, thumbnails, and video embedding — ideal for portfolios and media apps.

name: Vue ScrollTo
description: Vue ScrollTo is a smooth-scrolling plugin for Vue.js. It enables animated scrolling to elements via anchors or programmatic navigation, used in single-page landing pages and sections.

name: React Sticky
description: React Sticky is a React component that allows elements to stick to the viewport as the user scrolls. It’s useful for sticky headers, toolbars, or floating buttons in layouts.

name: Vue FullPage.js
description: Vue FullPage.js is a Vue wrapper for fullPage.js, enabling fullscreen scrolling websites. It supports vertical and horizontal slides, anchors, and callbacks — ideal for portfolios and one-page apps.

name: React Tooltip Lite
description: React Tooltip Lite is a lightweight tooltip component for React. It supports alignment, hover and click triggers, and accessibility features in a minimal footprint.

name: Vue Slick Carousel
description: Vue Slick Carousel is a responsive carousel component for Vue.js based on Slick Carousel. It supports autoplay, lazy loading, custom arrows, and swipe gestures.

name: React Breadcrumbs Dynamic
description: React Breadcrumbs Dynamic provides flexible breadcrumb components for React Router apps. It supports dynamic paths, nesting, and custom rendering for navigation trails.

name: Vue Image Lightbox
description: Vue Image Lightbox is a Vue component for image viewing with zoom, swipe, fullscreen, and keyboard support. Ideal for photo galleries and responsive media overlays.

name: React Device Detect
description: React Device Detect is a utility library that provides device and browser detection as components or hooks. It's useful for adaptive UIs or conditional rendering based on platform.

name: Vue Clickaway
description: Vue Clickaway is a simple directive that detects clicks outside an element. It’s often used for closing modals, dropdowns, or popups in Vue apps.

name: React Custom Scrollbars 2
description: React Custom Scrollbars 2 is a customizable scroll container for React with hidden native scrollbars. It supports auto-hide, horizontal/vertical scrolling, and theme integration.

name: Vue Context
description: Vue Context is a context menu plugin for Vue 2/3 that supports nested items, icons, themes, and keyboard navigation. It's useful for file explorers, admin panels, and right-click actions.

name: React Scroll Parallax
description: React Scroll Parallax provides simple hooks and components to create scroll-based parallax effects in React. It's optimized for performance and responsive layout behaviors.

name: Vue Treeselect
description: Vue Treeselect is a multi-select tree component with nested options, keyboard navigation, async loading, and filtering. It's designed for category selectors and complex UI dropdowns.
